title: Cabrillo National Monument: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping        Restaurants, Grocery Stores & Picnic Areas There are not any restaurants inside the park, however there are many available in the communities surrounding the park.  We have provided a link to the Chamber of Commerce where you can search for local restaurants. There are also many grocery stores within the local community for your convenience. There are not any picnic areas within the park. There are many places to sit and enjoy the view and eat your food. The park is a "Pack It In, Pack It Out" park, which means please take whatever trash you have out of the park and dispose of it properly. Lodging There is not lodging available within the park, however there are many available places within the city of San Diego. We have provided a link to the Chamber of Commerce to help you with this task should you need it. Campgrounds There are several campgrounds nearby and a link has been provided to assist with that task.
